summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in block 2, Dow & Tomlin's University Addition, and between Block 2, the University Addition, and Block 3, Supplemental Plat of McGuire and Holden's Addition to Latona, being the alley between 8th Avenue Northeast and 9th Avenue Northeast, from East 45th Street to East 47th Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8598 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
